column1: #Text=A polycrystalline sample of NaNiO2 was synthesized by\ra solid-state reaction technique.
#Text=Powders of Na2O2 and NiO were mixed in the ratio of 1.1:2 and pelletized in an Ar\ratmosphere.
#Text=The pelletized disk was heated at 700 ◦C in an\rO2 gas flow for 27 h.
#Text=This heating process was repeated after\ran intermediate grinding.
#Text=The obtained sample was confirmed\ras a single phase of NaNiO2 by powder x-ray diffraction\rmeasurements.
